text: Hello! I was tasked with migrating an existing site as is to a HubSpot CMS, and was provided Javascript files, HTML files, and CSS files. I'm stuck on the next steps and how to do it. I need help asap, as I'm running out of time to figure this out. Any help would be appreciated.

HubSpot system isn’t set up like that to just import html. you can do that but nothing will be editable. 

i’d suggest reaching out to someone to get this done for you or going through the cms certification, learning the boilerplate and starting your HubSpot development journey
might want to look at integrations available or in the marketplace.
